DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare two methods of pregnancy termination on the time to delivery in the second trimester.
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Trial Comparing Misoprostol and Foley Bulb for Pregnancy Termination in the Second Trimester
DOC.detailed_description: Medical termination in the second trimester is performed for many indications. Successful termination is dependant on ripening of the cervix prior to labor induction. Multiple methods of cervical ripening and labor induction have been used for pregnancy termination in the second trimester. These two methods have different mechanisms of action. This study seeks to evaluate the effectiveness of these two methods.
DOC.criteria: indication for pregnancy termination, gestational age from 1327 weeks multiple gestation, previous uterine surgery, rupture of membranes, latex allergy
